columns.name: name
columns.description: The name of the resource.

columns.name: id
columns.description: The unique id identifying the resource in subscription.

columns.name: type
columns.description: The type of the resource.

columns.name: provisioning_state
columns.description: The provisioning state of the container registry at the time the operation was called. Valid values are: 'Creating', 'Updating', 'Deleting', 'Succeeded', 'Failed', 'Canceled'.

columns.name: creation_date
columns.description: The creation date of the container registry.

columns.name: admin_user_enabled
columns.description: Indicates whether the admin user is enabled, or not.

columns.name: data_endpoint_enabled
columns.description: Enable a single data endpoint per region for serving data.

columns.name: login_server
columns.description: The URL that can be used to log into the container registry.

columns.name: network_rule_bypass_options
columns.description: Indicates whether to allow trusted Azure services to access a network restricted registry. Valid values are: 'AzureServices', 'None'.

columns.name: public_network_access
columns.description: Indicates whether or not public network access is allowed for the container registry. Valid values are: 'Enabled', 'Disabled'.

columns.name: sku_name
columns.description: The SKU name of the container registry. Required for registry creation. Valid values are: 'Classic', 'Basic', 'Standard', 'Premium'.

columns.name: sku_tier
columns.description: The SKU tier based on the SKU name. Valid values are: 'Classic', 'Basic', 'Standard', 'Premium'.

columns.name: status
columns.description: The current status of the resource.

columns.name: status_message
columns.description: The detailed message for the status, including alerts and error messages.

columns.name: status_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the status was changed to the current value.

columns.name: storage_account_id
columns.description: The resource ID of the storage account. Only applicable to Classic SKU.

columns.name: zone_redundancy
columns.description: Indicates whether or not zone redundancy is enabled for this container registry. Valid values are: 'Enabled', 'Disabled'.

columns.name: data_endpoint_host_names
columns.description: A list of host names that will serve data when dataEndpointEnabled is true.

columns.name: encryption
columns.description: The encryption settings of container registry.

columns.name: identity
columns.description: The identity of the container registry.

columns.name: login_credentials
columns.description: The login credentials for the specified container registry.

columns.name: network_rule_set
columns.description: The network rule set for a container registry.

columns.name: policies
columns.description: The policies for a container registry.

columns.name: private_endpoint_connections
columns.description: A list of private endpoint connections for a container registry.

columns.name: system_data
columns.description: Metadata pertaining to creation and last modification of the resource.

columns.name: usages
columns.description: Specifies the quota usages for the specified container registry.

columns.name: webhooks
columns.description: Webhooks in Azure Container Registry provide a way to trigger custom actions in response to events happening within the registry.

columns.name: title
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionTitle

columns.name: tags
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionTags

columns.name: region
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionRegion

columns.name: resource_group
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionResourceGroup
